trans-unit.source: Implements ASP.NET template parsing for template files.
The BaseTemplateParser class provides parser functionality for the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl> and <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme> classes.
Because the BaseTemplateParser class is abstract, an instance of this class is not created directly.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.BaseTemplateParser"></xref> class.
Compiles and returns the type of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.UI.UserControl"></xref> control that is specified by the virtual path.

If a <xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter> object is defined and its <xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter.AllowVirtualReference%2A> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.BaseTemplateParser.GetUserControlType%2A> method raises an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.BaseTemplateParser.GetUserControlType%2A> method is a wrapper for the GetReferencedType method.
The virtual path of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.UI.UserControl"></xref>.
The type of the page or user control.
The parser does not permit a virtual reference to the resource specified by virtualPath.
Compiles and returns the type of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UserControl"></xref> object that is specified by the virtual path.

If a <xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter> object is defined and its <xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter.AllowVirtualReference%2A> property is `false`, the GetUserControlType method raises an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception.
Additionally, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> object that is referenced by the virtual path is marked as a no-compile control, an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception will be thrown.

To force a <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> to be compiled, set the compilation mode attribute in its [@ Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5fd824c2-7d70-4f8a-ab47-0c7e0e43578b) directive to the <xref:System.Web.UI.CompilationMode> field.

To set the compilation mode for pages and controls across an application, set the `compilationMode` attribute of the [pages Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4123bb66-3fe4-4d62-b70e-33758656b458) in the Web.config file.
The virtual path of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UserControl"></xref>.
The type of the user control.
